author: Xbox
description:
Enter the world of Netflix’s Stranger Things and explore the faithful recreation of Hawkins. Two iconic franchises have come together to combine the authenticity and realism of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024 with the exciting, mysterious world of Stranger Things. 

Think you have what it takes to fly a Bell UH-1H Huey and help the residents of Hawkins in their latest encounters with the Upside Down? Try your hand at five exhilarating rescue missions!

This update is FREE to all owners of Microsoft Flight Simulator 2024. Ensure that your simulator is updated to the latest version, download the Stranger Things update, and start exploring Hawkins. 

The sky is calling!

author: Xbox
description:
Planet of Lana II is coming to Xbox in early 2026 - wishlist now! https://www.microsoft.com/store/productid/9pl89b9hcz9w
Game Directors Adam Stjärnljus and Klas Martin Eriksson present exclusive new footage from Planet of Lana II: Children of the Leaf, revealed during the Unity Awards showcase.

In this sneak peek, they introduce a new gameplay feature coming to the sequel, including one of the adorable new creatures players can use to shape the environment to their advantage. These small, fluffy Rollers can help Lana and Mui open entirely new paths and possibilities.

Planet of Lana II is an emotional, companion-driven puzzle-adventure set in a beautifully hand-painted world filled with wonder, danger, and hope.

author: Xbox
description:
Showgunners, a turn-based tactical combat game, launches on February 19, 2026 on Xbox Series X|S, Xbox One, and Windows Store.

In a dystopian future where corporations rule, a brutal reality show is the hottest entertainment property in town! Step into the role of Scarlett as you battle through deadly urban arenas filled with lethal traps, twisted puzzles, and hordes of heavily armed psychopaths. Fight for survival — and for revenge.

🔗 Wishlist Now!
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/showgunners/9pjqwb0hjjj2

🎮 Play the Demo!
https://www.xbox.com/games/store/showgunners-demo/9N6QQMT3SH99

Ultimate Sheep Raccoon is a bike-racing party game where you and your friends build the course together. Add obstacles and dangerous traps, take the lead with power-ups, and race to the finish!

Follow us for more Ultimate Sheep Raccoon.

author: Xbox
description:
The past and the future collide in Terminator 2D: NO FATE, an officially licensed 2D side-scroller bringing classic arcade action to Xbox Series X|S and Xbox One on December 12th, 2025!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/terminator-2d-no-fate/9pmt5ql5j54m

Play as Sarah Connor and the T-800 through a variety of thrilling missions as they take on the T-1000 and try to put a stop to Skynet’s plans before the human race is annihilated. Lead the Resistance as John Connor in the future, fighting on the front lines as mankind’s only hope in the War Against the Machines.

In this unique story blending iconic scenes from ‘Terminator 2: Judgment Day’ with original scenarios and multiple endings, humanity’s fate is yours to decide

© 2025 Reef Entertainment Ltd. All rights reserved. Published by Reef Entertainment Ltd. Developed by Bitmap Bureau Ltd.

Terminator 2: Judgment Day, T2, THE TERMINATOR, ENDOSKELETON, and any depiction of Endoskeleton are trademarks of STUDIOCANAL S.A.S. All Rights Re
title: Terminator™ 2D: NO FATE – Official Launch Trailer

author: Xbox
description:
Crossplay is now available! Play with anyone on any platform with crossplay and Friend’s Pass today.

LEGO® Voyagers is out now on Xbox Series X|S

The journey begins here:

Xbox Series X|S: https://www.xbox.com/games/store/lego-voyagers/9NKD66G942R8 

From the makers of LEGO® Builder's Journey comes a new 2-player co-op adventure about friendship and play. When two friends make it their mission to rescue an abandoned spaceship, they embark on a journey beyond their wildest dreams, ultimately learning the value of being connected.

LEGO, the LEGO logo, and the Brick and Knob configuration are trademarks of the LEGO Group.

author: Xbox
description:
Get ready for the ultimate holiday gaming experience! Season of Xbox is here, bringing you nonstop fun with dynamic worlds, fresh content drops, and epic in-game events. Discover new adventures every week as your favorite live service games roll out seasonal updates and surprises.

Whether you’re looking for new challenges or just want to play with friends, there’s always something happening on Xbox.

Explore, compete, and celebrate with weekly featured games and regular updates that keep the action going all season long.

Don’t miss out—jump in, play now, and make this holiday unforgettable with Xbox!

#SeasonOfXbox #XboxPlayNow #HolidayGaming #LiveServiceGames #XboxEvents
